item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 09 Dec 2025
item.description:
1. editors dev-meeting: 15th of December about the ~ocaml.nvim~ plugin
  2. Mosaic - A Modern Terminal User Interface Framework for OCaml (Early Preview)
  3. Making html_of_jsx ~10x faster
  4. Tyre - type-safe regular expressions 1.0
  5. Porting an OxCaml Project to Dune Package Management
  6. Other OCaml News
